videoSnippet.title: monkaS || Carlsen vs Nakamura || Lindores Abbey (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
Send me questions for Hikaru here 
agadmatorpodcast@gmail.com

Follow me on Instagram for extra content and notifications https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Magnus Carlsen vs Hikaru Nakamura
Lindores Abbey Rapid Challenge (2020), 30.5.2020, Armageddon
Queen's Gambit Declined, classical variation (5.Bf4) (D37)

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 d5 4. Nc3 Be7 5. Bf4 O-O 6. e3 Nbd7 7. Be2 dxc4 8. O-O a6 9. a4 Nd5 10. Bg3 c5 11. Bxc4 cxd4 12. exd4 N7b6 13. Bb3 a5 14. Ne5 Bd7 15. Ne4 Bc6 16. Nxc6 bxc6 17. Rc1 Nb4 18. Qe2 N6d5 19. Rfd1 Re8 20. Qf3 Ra7 21. Be5 Bf8 22. Qg3 f6 23. Bd6 Bxd6 24. Nxd6 Rf8 25. Ne4 Qb8 26. Qf3 Re8 27. g3 Kh8 28. Nc5 Rae7 29. Bc4 e5 30. dxe5 Qxe5 31. Rd2 Qg5 32. Nb3 Nb6 33. h4 Qe5 34. Re2 Qc7 35. Rxe7 Qxe7 36. Nxa5 Qe5 37. Nb3 Nxa4 38. Bf7 Rf8 39. Rc4 Rxf7 40. Rxb4 Qe1+ 41. Kh2 Qxb4 42. Qxc6 Rf8
